subTitle: Created by gdkchan and actively developed by a passionate team.
areaDevDescription: If you have experience in C#, Switch Homebrew, graphic/website design, software quality assurance or beta testing, Discord management, or any other skills that could be useful in helping the Ryujinx project, please contact us at our Discord server.
areaDonationDescription: Not a developer? There are other ways to support us! Monetary donations are by no means required; however, they help offset the cost of necessary hardware, development software licenses, server costs, and the like. In return, Patreon supporters get some special perks(for example, access to a patreon-only support channel on our Discord).
